subject: Basketball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: LeBron James, Dwyane Wade and Chris Bosh were expected to lead the Miami Heat to the N.B.A.’s stratosphere. But the team has struggled early in the season.
snippet: LeBron James, Dwyane Wade and Chris Bosh were expected to lead the Miami Heat to the N.B.A.’s stratosphere. But the team has struggled early in the season.
